author: Dr15Jones
body:
There is no code in CMSSW which called the member functions of
EcalRegionCabling that took RefGetter and LazyGetter as arguments.
Given the Getter classes have thread-safety issues we want to
minimize classes which depend upon them.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_6_X #11788 (original by @Dr15Jones).
title: Removed API for RefGetter and LazyGetter from EcalRegionCabling
